trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the bounding rectangle necessary to accept new text changes.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato quando cambia il rettangolo di delimitazione accettare il nuovo testo.

trans-unit.source: If the text within the control spans multiple lines, the requested rectangle will always be the width of the control.
trans-unit.target: Se il testo all'interno del controllo si estende su più righe, il rettangolo richiesto sarà sempre la larghezza del controllo.

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event in your control to implement auto-resizing for multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: È possibile gestire questo evento di controllo per implementare il ridimensionamento automatico per su più righe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The ContentsResizedEventArgs identifies the requested size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Il ContentsResizedEventArgs identifica la dimensione richiesta del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContentsResizedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContentsResizedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the requested dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che specifica le dimensioni richieste del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Represents the requested size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la dimensione richiesta del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: When text is entered into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control determines the proper size of the control in order to display all of the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando il testo viene inserito il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>(controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controllo determina le dimensioni appropriate del controllo per visualizzare tutto il contenuto del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use the NewRectangle property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control to properly size the control to display all of the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà NewRectangle in un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized>evento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>controllo per impostare correttamente le dimensioni del controllo per visualizzare tutto il contenuto del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the requested size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta la dimensione richiesta del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox"> </xref> controllo.
